meanings.sent1: She kept misstopping the car at the intersection, causing confusion.
meanings.sent2: The mechanic warned against misstopping the engine abruptly to avoid damage.
meanings.sent3: The robot misstopped its movements, making everyone laugh at the silly dance.
meanings.sent4: His fear misstopped him in his tracks, unable to move forward.
meanings.sent5: The child's attempt to tie shoelaces kept misstopping, leading to frustration.

meanings.definition: The act of stopping incorrectly or inadequately.
meanings.sent1: The misstopping of the train delayed the entire schedule.
meanings.sent2: He noticed the misstopping of the clock, causing it to run fast.
meanings.sent3: The misstopping of the music abruptly startled the audience.
meanings.sent4: The misstopping of the waterfall created a beautiful cascade effect.
meanings.sent5: The misstopping of the conveyor belt led to a pile-up of packages.
